Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (0 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 14 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Full Plate Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Greatpick (+6 1d10+1 P [Crit d12]; strength; expert); Kukri (+6 1d6+1 S; strength; expert); Warhammer (+6 1d8+1 B; strength; expert)

Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Allows making a melee Strike on a foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, it negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of any remaining damage
Sudden Charge: (2) Allows making a melee Strike after a double Stride

Save Notes: Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
